name: Post Apocalypse Vintage Commercial // Click the Clock 420
description:
It's 3020 and someway, somehow, the humans fucked it up. What a surprise right? 
There is a long list explaining everything happened back in the days, but it's not time to cover it yet. 

Few humans all around the world survived (in a lower number than rats), and started a new society based on what they have left: cryptos, technology, scarcity of water and food, artificial intelligence, mostly metaverse based.

"Click the clock 420" is a commercial of a little shop selling mainly clocks and hemp based products. It's also focused on second-hand real components of vintage hardwares. 100% Humans service // Open 24h // Accepting Tezos! :)

Made in Aseprite - 1280x1920 - Teletext palette
